eatLikeShit: You feel like you're going to vomit if you eat it again
fussy.configuration.resetOnDeath.tooltip: Whether or not food preferences are reset after death
fussy.configuration.preferenceReducePerc: When food is consumed, the level of food preference will be multiplied by that percentage
fussy.configuration.preferenceRaiseAmoun: The percentage of food preference that increases when one food is eaten
fussy.configuration.spitUpThreshold.tool: Continuing to eat food below this percentage will cause vomiting
fussy.configuration.hateThreshold.toolti: Continuing to eat food when the food preference level is below this percentage will cause nausea
